name: BROCOMAN
description:
The Broccoli harvesting season is upon us, and you (BROCOMAN)  are the only one who can stop your broccoli friends from dying at the hands of the farmers.

  •  Use WASD to Move
  •  Use LEFT SHIFT to Run
  •  Use LEFT CLICK to Punch your broccoli friends and throw them away from the farmers (You can’t hit the farmer, you are just a brocoli after all)
  •  Use RIGHT CLICK to activate your Special Ability and stop the time
  •  Use Q to EXPLODE (must be charged beforehand)
  •  Every 5 broccolis you punch, another 10 will grow. They just love being punched.
 TRY TO SAVE YOUR BROCCOLI FRIENDS FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN.
